### Baseline on size of BSL relative to GDP
```{r}
fit_0 <- lm(e_embi_5d_diff~size, main_df)
summary(fit_0)
```
### Specification 1: dummy=1 if lender is China, zero otherwise, and this variable interacted with Size BSL
```{r}
fit1_1 <- lm(e_embi_5d_diff~size + china, main_df)
summary(fit1_1)
```
```{r}
### add interaction with size
fit1_2 <- lm(e_embi_5d_diff~size * china, main_df)
summary(fit1_2)
```
### Specification 2: dummy=1 if BSL is not the first, zero otherwise, and this variable interacted with Size BSL
```{r}
fit2_1 <- lm(e_embi_5d_diff~size+is_first, main_df)
summary(fit2_1)
```
```{r}
###Add interaction
fit2_2 <- lm(e_embi_5d_diff ~size*is_first, main_df)
summary(fit2_2)
```
